channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Disney signs deal with OpenAI to allow Sora to generate AI videos featuring its characters
item.description: Disney says that alongside the agreement, it will "become a major customer of OpenAI," as it will use its APIs to build new products, tools, and exper...

item.title: Interest in Spoor’s bird monitoring AI software is soaring
item.description: Spoor's computer vision software can help wind farms, and other industries, track bird populations and migration patterns.

item.title: AT&T’s Connected Life Platform Is a Second Try in the Smart-Home Space
item.description: The carrier’s Connected Life platform, now available nationwide, lets AT&T customers easily set up a smart-home security system.

item.title: Security flaws in Freedom Chat app exposed users’ phone numbers and PINs
item.description: The founder of Freedom Chat said the company has reset user PINs and released a new version to app stores.

item.title: 6 Best Costco TVs That We’ve Tried and Recommend (2025)
item.description: Costco fans rejoice. We’ve found great deals on televisions exclusively for members.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make you...

item.title: Operation Bluebird Wants to Bring ‘Twitter’ Back to Life
item.description: Elon Musk “bid adieu to the Twitter brand” in 2023 in favor of X. A startup wants to resurrect it.

item.title: On Me raises $6M to shake up the gift card industry
item.description: On Me raises $6 million for its digital gift card platform that lets users purchase cards categorized by interests rather than being restricted to spe...

item.title: 6 Best Smart Christmas Lights (2025): Twinkly, Govee, Cync
item.description: Control these smart lights with a voice command or a tap on your phone. Now that’s a Christmas miracle.

item.title: TIME names ‘Architects of AI’ its Person of the Year
item.description: TIME Magazine has named the 'Architects of AI' its Person of the Year, who include Jensen Huang, Elon Musk, Sam Altman, Mark Zuckerberg, Lisa Su, Dari...
